author: Hoàng Chuẩn Trần
footerBio: Hi, I’m Hoàng Chuẩn Trần, a software engineer passionate about building platform and scalable backend systems and exploring innovative tech solutions. On this blog, I share insights, experiences, and lessons learned from my journey in platform engineering. Thanks for stopping by!
